## Repository.findByFields() method

Find docs by specifics fields

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fields | Fields | The fields to match |
|  options | Options | _(Optional)_ Data source options |
